school.name: Academia de Studii Economice din București

profile_positions.description:
A Senior Analyst role with focused on:
•	Manage month-end closing activities for 21 legal entities across EMEA Region
•	Ensure accurate and timely supplier ledger reconciliation, invoice, Iexpense and payments processing
•	Resolve urgent queries related to Accounts Payable bookings, including tax and treasury items
•	Liaise with Accounts Receivable, Intercompany and General Ledger teams for accounting reconciliation
•	Provide reporting analysis and KPI’s to Finance Leadership team
•	Maintain VAT and WHT tax codes, Iexpense approval limits and internal bank accounts in the ERP database
•	Acted as bank trusted person and primary authorizer for all payments performed by NetApp EMEA entities
•	Maintain best practices and risk controls procedures in compliance with SOX standards
•	Lead two waves of outsourcing for Purchase to Pay activities, including preparation of end-to-end documentation (process maps and SOP’s), process training sessions and post transition support
•	Design, test and implement RPA (Robotics Process Automation) for Accounts Payable month-end closing activities and Payment Batch Run
•	Appointed as program and card administrator for the roll-out of Travel & Expenses AMEX credit card across multiple legal entities within EMEA and APAC Regions
•	Coordinate the implementation of SEPA banking project for company accounts in scope
•	Act as business solution designer and tester for the migration of Purchase to Pay and Expense modules from Oracle 11 to Oracle to 11i version
•	Test the e-invoicing solution, liaising with vendors to support the implementation before go-live
•	Lead the execution of ‘Host2Host’connectivity project for all company disbursement accounts (set up of direct interface between ERP and bank portal)
•	Support the set-up of Intercompany buy-sell model, automating the offsetting of Accounts Receivable and Payable balances
•	Coordinate the integration of Purchase to Pay processes of the companies acquired by NetApp (Greenqloud and Plexistore)
profile_positions.title: Senior Purchase to Pay Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Consultant role for the establishment of Heineken BV Shared Service in Krakow, transferring in-house operations from Paris and Amsterdam sites
•	In partnership with Heineken auditors, define service level agreement and build the end-to-end roadmap plan for processes to transition to the new Shared Service Center
•	Document Accounts Payable and Receivable processes and exceptions
•	Design process maps, SOP’s of the final processes and define ‘future’ Key Performance Indicators
•	Estimate resource capacity, including stuff interviewing during hiring process
•	Prepare project reporting status (transition tollgate and milestones) for the presentation to Heineken Finance Leadership team and Global process owners
•	Monitor the transition of the processes to the Shared Service Center
•	Act as subject matter expert for the operational support of a team of 16 during the set-up phase
profile_positions.title: Project Consultant for Heineken BV

profile_positions.description:
Managed a team of 11 direct reports, supervising the following AP operations for 19 NetApp legal entities: Invoice & Payment processing, bank reconciliation, vendor database maintenance, employee I-expense reports audit and payment, month end closing activities, employee and vendor queries;
The role included the review, audit and sign off Quarterly SOX documents, monthly KPI reports building and presenting, identifying improvement and corrective actions areas, running process standardization using Six Sigma methodology and best practice implementation.
profile_positions.title: Accounts Payable Team Leader for NetApp EMEA

profile_positions.description:
This role included handling of:  invoice processing, supplier query through email and phone calls, vendor database maintenance requests,  bank account items reconciliation, VAT / tax corrections, supplier debit balances collection and statement reconciliations.
Within the same role, I traveled to India and trained a team of 20 during 3 months of stay as a result of a transformation project  where all Pfizer ‘purchase to pay’ operations have been in-sourced from Bucharest Genpact location to New Delhi Genpact location.
profile_positions.title: Accounts Payable Analyst for Pfizer
